department: DO NOT DELETE - Department of National Defense (DND)
short_summary: Range/Lot Service:  Canada seeks offers for a floor scrubber to be used by the Department of National Defense (DND)
description: Canada is seeking offers to provide a floor scrubber to The Department of National Defense (DND). Bidders may request a debriefing on the results of the bid solicitation. This solicitation of offers cancels and supersedes previous solicitation of offers number W0100-233927/A dated December 8, 2023 with a closing of January 9, 2024 at 15:30 NST. A debriefing or feedback session will be provided upon request to Offeror's who offered on the previous solicitation.Bidders should make the request to the Contracting Authority within 15 working days from receipt of notification that their bid was unsuccessful. Reference the solicitation for further details.The full Request for Proposal (RFP) and attachments can only be accessed and downloaded when logged into your SAP Ariba account and you have filled out your Government of Canada profile.
full_summary:
**Government Tender Announcement**
==============================

**Solicitation Details**
-----------------------

*   **Title**: Floor Scrubber - DND
*   **Reference Number**: WS4312903993-Doc4434314127
*   **Amendment Number**: 1
*   **Solicitation Number**: WS4312903993
*   **Publication Date**: February 7, 2024
*   **Closing Date**: February 22, 2024, at 14:00
*   **Status**: **Expires**

**Responsive Selection Criteria**
--------------------------------

*   **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open bidding
*   **Trade Agreements**: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
*   **Regions of Opportunity**: None
*   **Regions of Delivery**: Nova Scotia
*   **Contracting Entity**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
*   **End User Entities**: Department of National Defence (DND)

**Some Required Information cannot be omitted**

* The most critical path this notice is that bid cannot be opened electronically by SAP Ariba. The system now cancels and supersedes all previous notices. The entire RFP [attached document same as previous] available is written in English only but accept any price in currency, more neither affiliations nor confirmation letter explained (may exclude US by default).
* Suppliers must complete their profile with the Government of Canada with complete all mandatory fields.



**Points of Contact**
----------------------

*   Name: Genevieve Petten
*   Title: Contracting Authority
*   Email: <genevieve.petten@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca>
*   Organization: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)

**Additional Information**
-------------------------

This notice cancels and supersedes previous notice W0100-233927/A. Bidders may request a debriefing or feedback session upon bid submission. Suppliers are required to complete their profile with the Government of Canada and adhere to the specified tender closing date and time. */
